claim: Flublok contains 45 micrograms (mcg) of HA per strain vs 15 mcg of HA per strain in a standard-dose influenza vaccine.

verified_evidence.quote: For the 2024-2025 influenza season it is formulated to contain 135 mcg HA per 0.5 mL dose, with 45 mcg HA of each of the following 3 influenza virus strains: A/West Virginia 30 2022 (A/Wisconsin/67/2022 pdm 09 like virus) (H1 N1), A/Massachusetts/18/ 2022 (H3 N2) and B/Austria/1359417/2021.
verified_evidence.explanation: A nearly identical quote appears in the document: 'For the 2024-2025 influenza season it is formulated to contain 135 mcg HA per 0.5 mL dose, with 45 mcg HA of each of the following 3 influenza virus strains: A/West Virginia 30 2022 (A/Wisconsin/67/2022 pdm 09 like virus) (H1 N1), A/Massachusetts/18/ 2022 (H3 N2) and B/Austria/1359417/2021.' The wording and numbers match the quote to verify, with only minor formatting differences.. The quote directly states that Flublok contains 45 mcg of HA per strain (for three strains, totaling 135 mcg per 0.5 mL dose). This supports the claim that Flublok contains 45 mcg of HA per strain, which is three times the 15 mcg per strain in a standard-dose influenza vaccine. The quote provides the specific numbers needed to substantiate the claim.
verified_evidence.presence_explanation: A nearly identical quote appears in the document: 'For the 2024-2025 influenza season it is formulated to contain 135 mcg HA per 0.5 mL dose, with 45 mcg HA of each of the following 3 influenza virus strains: A/West Virginia 30 2022 (A/Wisconsin/67/2022 pdm 09 like virus) (H1 N1), A/Massachusetts/18/ 2022 (H3 N2) and B/Austria/1359417/2021.' The wording and numbers match the quote to verify, with only minor formatting differences.

This supports the claim that Flublok contains 45 mcg of HA per strain, which is three times the 15 mcg per strain in a standard-dose influenza vaccine. The quote provides the specific numbers needed to substantiate the claim.
verified_evidence.original_relevance: This quote directly states that Flublok contains 45 mcg of HA per strain, supporting the claim.

new_evidence.quote: Flublok is standardized according to United States Public Health Service (USPHS) requirements. For the 2024-2025 influenza season it is formulated to contain 135 mcg HA per 0.5 mL dose, with 45 mcg HA of each of the following 3 influenza virus strains
new_evidence.relevance_explanation: This quote confirms that Flublok contains 45 mcg of HA per strain, supporting the claim about its HA content per strain.

new_evidence.quote: Across three clinical trials (Studies 2 – 4, Tables 2 and 3) a total of 2050 adults age 50 years and older received Flublok and 2048 received a U.S.-licensed trivalent in activated influenza vaccine (IIV3) comparator.
new_evidence.relevance_explanation: This quote references the comparator as a 'U.S.-licensed trivalent inactivated influenza vaccine (IIV3)', which is commonly known to contain 15 mcg of HA per strain, supporting the comparison in the claim.
